meanings.definition: The act of holding oneself back from doing something.
meanings.sent1: Her refrainment from eating sweets helped her stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: His refrainment from interrupting others showed his good manners.
meanings.sent3: The cat's refrainment from chasing the mouse was quite surprising.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's refrainment from celebrating too early cost him the victory.
meanings.sent5: The child's refrainment from touching the hot stove was a wise decision.

meanings.definition: The state of abstaining from a particular action or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised refrainment from smoking to improve his health.
meanings.sent2: Her refrainment from gossiping kept her out of trouble.
meanings.sent3: The monkey's refrainment from eating bananas was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His refrainment from spending money recklessly saved him from debt.
meanings.sent5: The student's refrainment from cheating in the exam was commendable.
